misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
vulnerable_code:
SecureRandom rand1 = new SecureRandom(seedBytes);        
SecureRandom rand2 = new SecureRandom(seedBytes);
description: Using the same seed to initialize two instances of SecureRandom may result in a less-random sequence of numbers.
recommendation: Each SecureRandom instance should be properly seeded with a unique and sufficiently random seed value to ensure the randomness of the generated numbers.
